meanings.definition: The quality of being pertinent; relevance.
meanings.sent1: The pertinencies of the evidence helped the detective solve the case.
meanings.sent2: She always focuses on the pertinencies of the topic during discussions.
meanings.sent3: The pertinencies of the situation made everyone laugh at the misunderstanding.
meanings.sent4: His speech was filled with the pertinencies of a seasoned debater.
meanings.sent5: The teacher emphasized the pertinencies of studying for the upcoming exam.

meanings.definition: An accessory or other item associated with a particular activity or style of living.
meanings.sent1: She packed all her camping pertinencies for the weekend trip.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen is equipped with all the necessary pertinencies for cooking.
meanings.sent3: His collection of vintage pertinencies always catches the eye of visitors.
meanings.sent4: The artist's studio was filled with colorful pertinencies for her next project.
meanings.sent5: The explorer carried essential pertinencies for surviving in the wilderness.
